insert into wages_reparent( managerName, wages_month, wages_year, createBy, createTime, memo ) values ( #{managerName}, #{wagesMonth}, #{wagesYear}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{memo} )
mapper.update:
update wages_parent t
t.managerName = #{managerName},
t.wages_month = #{wagesMonth},
t.wages_year = #{wagesYear},
t.createBy = #{createBy},
t.createTime = #{createTime},
t.memo = #{memo},
where t.id=#{id}

mapper.delete: delete from wages_reparent where wages_month=#{wagesMonth} AND wages_year=#{wagesYear}
